title: About Me
subtitle: Passionate frontend developer with 5+ years of experience creating modern web applications
paragraph: I'm a frontend developer who loves turning complex problems into simple, beautiful designs. My journey in web development started 5 years ago, and I've been passionate about creating exceptional user experiences ever since.
I specialize in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS frameworks, with a strong focus on performance optimization and accessibility. I believe that great code should be both functional and elegant.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

features.title: Clean Code
features.description: Writing maintainable, scalable, and well-documented code that follows best practices.

features.title: UI/UX Design
features.description: Creating intuitive and beautiful user interfaces with attention to user experience.

features.title: Performance
features.description: Optimizing applications for speed, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.

features.title: Collaboration
features.description: Working effectively in teams using modern development workflows and tools.
